data.name: 0000 (205.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: There's something I meant to say earlier…

data.name: 0001 (205.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Earlier? When?

data.name: 0002 (205.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's about when we went to get the key to the music room.

data.name: 0003 (205.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Koizumi talked to the teacher, and they gave us the key straight away without any doubts.

data.name: 0004 (205.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What of it?

data.name: 0005 (205.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I was just thinking that Koizumi is pretty well received by the teachers.

data.name: 0006 (205.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: He's the absolute portrait of a model student.

data.name: 0007 (205.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Compared to you, almost anyone could be a model student.

data.name: 0008 (205.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What's that supposed to mean, then?

data.name: 0009 (205.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You don't study seriously, just try to slack off. There's nothing positive I can say.

data.name: 0010 (205.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I don't hate studying--I'm good at it. It's still better.

data.name: 0011 (205.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Says the school's number one problem child. She seems wholly lacking in self-awareness.

data.name: 0012 (205.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You should learn from Koizumi's example and take life more seriously.

data.name: 0013 (205.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I honestly have my doubts about whether he's serious or not…

data.name: 0014 (205.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Suzumiya, did you hear already?

data.name: 0015 (205.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What is it, Mikuru?

data.name: 0016 (205.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: It's about when we got the key for the music room.

data.name: 0017 (205.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: How Koizumi was a huge help and stuff…

data.name: 0018 (205.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: No, I've not heard about this. How did he help?

data.name: 0019 (205.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Well, the teacher on duty seemed to be a difficult person…

data.name: 0020 (205.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: But Koizumi was able to easily get the key with just a couple of words.

data.name: 0021 (205.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Koizumi did, huh…?

data.name: 0022 (205.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: So Kyon called Koizumi a teacher's beloved model student.

data.name: 0023 (205.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That idiot.

data.name: 0024 (205.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Why does he feel he needs to say that stuff?

data.name: 0025 (205.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'll give him a thorough lecturing after the summer camp is over.

data.name: 0026 (205.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Th-that would be... my fault....

data.name: 0027 (205.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I won't tell him you told me, so don't worry.

data.name: 0028 (205.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eeek... Sorry Kyon...

data.name: 0029 (205.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hm? Koizumi is a model student?

data.name: 0030 (205.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Who said that? Kyon?

data.name: 0031 (205.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Yes.

data.name: 0032 (205.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: When borrowing the key to the music room, negotiations with the teacher were smooth.

data.name: 0033 (205.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: A feat only a model student would be capable of.

data.name: 0034 (205.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …That's what Kyon said, right?

data.name: 0035 (205.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Yes

data.name: 0036 (205.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: He definitely means "model student" in the bad way then.

data.name: 0037 (205.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: I require an explanation of said usage.

data.name: 0038 (205.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It means putting on an air of seriousness. It's just Kyon's warped view of the world.

data.name: 0039 (205.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'd better scold him later…

data.name: 0041 (205.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: A little earlier I was told this--

data.name: 0042 (205.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: That I am a "model student"--said with a fed up expression.

data.name: 0043 (205.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Who said that? ...Well, who else could it be... It's obviously Kyon.

data.name: 0044 (205.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed. It seems I appear to him to be a model student. I'm unsure as to why though.

data.name: 0045 (205.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well, it's not entirely untrue. You have a certain seriousness about you.

data.name: 0046 (205.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I don't imagine serious people pursue unnatural phenomena like I am presently.

data.name: 0047 (205.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You have a point. That's exactly it.

data.name: 0048 (205.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If you really were a totally perfect model student, you'd be useless to the SOS Brigade.

data.name: 0049 (205.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: You flatter me.

data.name: 0050 (205.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'm truly delighted to hear those words coming from you, Miss Suzumiya.

data.name: 0051 (205.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Though, I wonder why Kyon would say such a thing?

data.name: 0052 (205.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Surely because of my smooth negotiations with the teacher to borrow the key.

data.name: 0053 (205.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: He called you a model student just because of that?

data.name: 0054 (205.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: In terms of being well received by teachers, I certainly may seem like a model student.

data.name: 0055 (205.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Even if it's hardly true in reality.

data.name: 0056 (205.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well, setting Kyon's stupid assumptions aside--getting the key was a huge help.

data.name: 0057 (205.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's the Koizumi I entrusted into the brigade--you have my praise.

data.name: 0058 (205.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: it is an honor to hear that from the brigade chief herself.
